contentList.content: This wooden stick produces an intense flash of light that can reorganize neural synapses in the host's brain. Can be used to selectively purge memories or for a total memory wipe. Warning: Effects of long term exposure are unknown.

This wooden stick produces an intense flash of light that can reorganize neural synapses in the host's brain. Can be used to selectively purge memories or for a total memory wipe. The safety cap has been pryed off. <font color=#FF0000>Warning: The Safety features have been turned off and the device is running at max capacity. CAUTION ADVISED. Any skills (innate, item-granted, status-granted etc.) not on the skillbar/hotbar will be removed.</font>
